NOTE: To play Sega CD/Mega CD games, you will need to have BIOS files placed in the same directory as the game you want to play. They should be named as follows:

* bios_CD_E.bin

* bios_CD_U.bin

* bios_CD_J.bin

In case it needs any explaining, bios_CD_E.bin is the Mega CD EU BIOS, bios_CD_U.bin is the Sega CD US BIOS, and bios_CD_J.bin is the Mega CD Japanese BIOS.
